hero.title: Galih Aji Pangestu
hero.subtitle: Software Developer
hero.description: Building reliable, human-centered web experiences. Focused on stability, clarity, and real solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I believe that good software starts from understanding the problem, not from chasing the latest technology. Every project I work on always begins with the question: what do users actually need?
about.p2: Stability and clarity are two things I always prioritize. The code I write must be easy for the team to understand, easy to maintain, and of course work well.
about.highlight1Desc: Improved page load time by 40% through image optimization and lazy loading
about.highlight2Desc: Built applications used by hundreds of active users every day
about.highlight3Desc: Regularly taking online courses and reading documentation to stay updated

items.title: Internal Dashboard Transformation
items.problem: The company's internal dashboard had 8+ second load times and confusing navigation.
items.importance: The dashboard is used by 50+ employees daily for business operations.
items.approach: Chose an incremental approach: optimize performance first, then redesign UX.
items.challenges: Undocumented legacy code, resistance from teams accustomed to the old system.
items.solution: Created documentation for existing code first, then gradual refactoring.
items.results: Load time dropped to 2 seconds (75% improvement). New employee training time reduced by 80%.
items.reflection: If I could do it again, I would involve stakeholders earlier in the process.
